Changelog
=========

0.0.2 (2016-09-19)
------------------

* 'top' argument of ``explain_prediction``
  can be a tuple (num_positive, num_negative);
* classifier name is no longer pronted by default;
* added eli5.sklearn.explain_prediction to explain individual examples;
* fixed numpy warning.

0.0.1 (2016-09-15)
------------------

Pre-release.
